definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: Voyeurism and exhibitionism intertwine in these purposefully provocative scenes.
sentences.chinese: 窺淫癖和露陰癖交織在這些刻意挑釁的場景。
